001324  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;785
001328  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;786
00132c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;786
00132e  f8095001          STRB     r5,[r9,r1]            ;786
001332  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;787
001336  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;787
001338  f8097000          STRB     r7,[r9,r0]            ;787
00133c  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;788
001340  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;788
001342  f8096001          STRB     r6,[r9,r1]            ;788
001346  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;789
00134a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;789
00134c  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;789
001350  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;790
001354  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;790
001356  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;790
00135a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;791
00135e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;791
001360  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;791
001364  f8098001          STRB     r8,[r9,r1]            ;792
001368  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;793
00136c  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;793
001370  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;793
001374  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001378  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;795
00137c  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;795
00137e  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;795
001380  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001384  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;796
001388  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;796
00138a  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;796
00138c  d303              BCC      |L1.5014|
00138e  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;796
001392  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;796
                  |L1.5014|
001396  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;797
00139a  4880              LDR      r0,|L1.5532|
00139c  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;797
00139e  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;797
0013a2  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;797
0013a4  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
0013a8  e7b7              B        |L1.4890|
                  |L1.5034|
0013aa  f04f03c0          MOV      r3,#0xc0              ;806
0013ae  f10b0001          ADD      r0,r11,#1             ;806
0013b2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;806
0013b4  f809300b          STRB     r3,[r9,r11]           ;806
0013b8  f04f03c2          MOV      r3,#0xc2              ;807
0013bc  f1000c01          ADD      r12,r0,#1             ;807
0013c0  f00c0cff          AND      r12,r12,#0xff         ;807
0013c4  f8093000          STRB     r3,[r9,r0]            ;807
0013c8  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e              ;808
0013cc  f10c0001          ADD      r0,r12,#1             ;808
0013d0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;808
0013d2  f809300c          STRB     r3,[r9,r12]           ;808
0013d6  f04f0cc1          MOV      r12,#0xc1             ;809
0013da  f1000301          ADD      r3,r0,#1              ;809
0013de  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3                 ;809
0013e0  f809c000          STRB     r12,[r9,r0]           ;809
0013e4  f1030001          ADD      r0,r3,#1              ;810
0013e8  f0000cff          AND      r12,r0,#0xff          ;810
0013ec  f8092003          STRB     r2,[r9,r3]            ;810
0013f0  f10c0001          ADD      r0,r12,#1             ;811
0013f4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;811
0013f6  f809100c          STRB     r1,[r9,r12]           ;811
0013fa  f89d2009          LDRB     r2,[sp,#9]            ;812
0013fe  2a09              CMP      r2,#9                 ;812
001400  d20c              BCS      |L1.5148|
001402  f1020231          ADD      r2,r2,#0x31           ;814
001406  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;814
00140a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;814
00140c  f8092000          STRB     r2,[r9,r0]            ;814
001410  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;815
001414  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0                 ;815
001416  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;815
00141a  e024              B        |L1.5222|
                  |L1.5148|
00141c  f1a20109          SUB      r1,r2,#9              ;817
001420  295a              CMP      r1,#0x5a              ;817
001422  d216              BCS      |L1.5202|
001424  f1020201          ADD      r2,r2,#1              ;819
001428  f04f0b0a          MOV      r11,#0xa              ;819
00142c  fbb2f3fb          UDIV     r3,r2,r11             ;819
001430  f1030c30          ADD      r12,r3,#0x30          ;819
001434  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;819
001438  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;819
00143a  f809c000          STRB     r12,[r9,r0]           ;819
00143e  fb0b2013          MLS      r0,r11,r3,r2          ;820
001442  f1000030          ADD      r0,r0,#0x30           ;820
001446  f1010201          ADD      r2,r1,#1              ;820
00144a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2                 ;820
00144c  f8090001          STRB     r0,[r9,r1]            ;820
001450  e009              B        |L1.5222|
                  |L1.5202|
001452  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;824
001456  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;824
001458  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;824
00145c  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;825
001460  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0                 ;825
001462  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;825
                  |L1.5222|
001466  f1020001          ADD      r0,r2,#1              ;827
00146a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;827
00146c  f8094002          STRB     r4,[r9,r2]            ;827
001470  f89d1004          LDRB     r1,[sp,#4]            ;830
001474  f8ba203c          LDRH     r2,[r10,#0x3c]        ;830
001478  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;830
00147a  d149              BNE      |L1.5392|
00147c  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;830
001480  f89a2038          LDRB     r2,[r10,#0x38]        ;830
001484  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;830
001486  d143              BNE      |L1.5392|
001488  f89d1006          LDRB     r1,[sp,#6]            ;830
00148c  f89a202c          LDRB     r2,[r10,#0x2c]        ;830
001490  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;830
001492  d13d              BNE      |L1.5392|
001494  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;832
001498  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;832
00149a  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;832
00149e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;833
0014a2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;833
0014a4  f8097001          STRB     r7,[r9,r1]            ;833
0014a8  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a              ;834
0014ac  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;834
0014b0  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;834
0014b2  f8092000          STRB     r2,[r9,r0]            ;834
0014b6  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;835
0014ba  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;835
0014bc  f8095001          STRB     r5,[r9,r1]            ;835
0014c0  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;836
0014c4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;836
0014c6  f8096000          STRB     r6,[r9,r0]            ;836
0014ca  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;837
0014ce  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;837
0014d0  f8092001          STRB     r2,[r9,r1]            ;837
0014d4  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;838
0014d8  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;838
0014da  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;838
0014de  f8098001          STRB     r8,[r9,r1]            ;839
0014e2  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]            ;840
0014e6  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;840
0014ea  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;840
0014ee  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
0014f2  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]            ;841
0014f6  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;841
0014f8  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;841
0014fa  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
0014fe  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;842
001500  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]            ;842
001504  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;842
001506  e000              B        |L1.5386|
                  |L1.5384|
001508  e06f              B        |L1.5610|
                  |L1.5386|
00150a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
00150e  e704              B        |L1.4890|
                  |L1.5392|
001510  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;846
001514  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;846
001516  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;846
00151a  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;847
00151e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;847
001520  f8095001          STRB     r5,[r9,r1]            ;847
001524  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;848
001528  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;848
00152a  f8097000          STRB     r7,[r9,r0]            ;848
00152e  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;849
001532  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;849
001534  f8096001          STRB     r6,[r9,r1]            ;849
001538  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;850
00153c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;850
00153e  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;850
001542  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;851
001546  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;851
001548  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;851
00154c  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;852
001550  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;852
001552  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;852
001556  f8098001          STRB     r8,[r9,r1]            ;853
00155a  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;854
00155e  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0                 ;854
001562  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21              ;854
001566  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
00156a  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;855
00156e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;855
001570  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;855
001572  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001576  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;856
00157a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;856
00157c  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;856
00157e  d303              BCC      |L1.5512|
001580  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1                 ;856
001584  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;856
                  |L1.5512|
001588  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;857
00158c  4803              LDR      r0,|L1.5532|
00158e  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;857
001590  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;857
001594  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;857
001596  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
00159a  e6be              B        |L1.4890|
                  |L1.5532|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.5536|
0015a0  f1a10209          SUB      r2,r1,#9              ;897
0015a4  2a5a              CMP      r2,#0x5a              ;897
0015a6  d216              BCS      |L1.5590|
0015a8  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1              ;899
0015ac  f04f060a          MOV      r6,#0xa               ;899
0015b0  fbb1f3f6          UDIV     r3,r1,r6              ;899
0015b4  f1030530          ADD      r5,r3,#0x30           ;899
0015b8  f1000201          ADD      r2,r0,#1              ;899
0015bc  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2                 ;899
0015be  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;899
0015c2  fb061113          MLS      r1,r6,r3,r1           ;900
0015c6  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;900
0015ca  f1020001          ADD      r0,r2,#1              ;900
0015ce  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;900
0015d0  f8091002          STRB     r1,[r9,r2]            ;900
0015d4  e009              B        |L1.5610|
                  |L1.5590|
0015d6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1              ;904
0015da  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;904
0015dc  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;904
0015e0  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1              ;905
0015e4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;905
0015e6  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;905
                  |L1.5610|
0015ea  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;907
0015ee  e694              B        |L1.4890|
;;;910    
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;911    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;912    void community2lcd(char* in,
0015f0  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;913    			char xy,
;;;914    			char flash_pos,
;;;915    			char flash_on)
;;;916    {
0015f2  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0015f4  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0015f6  4616              MOV      r6,r2
0015f8  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;917    char temp;
;;;918    char i;
;;;919    //char n;
;;;920    
;;;921    
;;;922    i=find(xy);
0015fa  f7fffffe          BL       find
0015fe  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;923    
;;;924    //in1=192;
;;;925    
;;;926    //in2=34;
;;;927    
;;;928    
;;;929    
;;;930    temp=i;
001600  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;931    
;;;932    //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;933    if(temp!=255)
;;;934    while (*in)
;;;935    	{
;;;936    	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
001602  4dff              LDR      r5,|L1.6656|
001604  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;933
001606  d106              BNE      |L1.5654|
001608  e008              B        |L1.5660|
                  |L1.5642|
00160a  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
00160c  f1040401          ADD      r4,r4,#1
;;;937    	temp++;
001610  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
001614  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.5654|
001616  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;934
001618  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;934
00161a  d1f6              BNE      |L1.5642|
                  |L1.5660|
;;;938        	}
;;;939    
;;;940    
;;;941    
;;;942    if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
00161c  48f9              LDR      r0,|L1.6660|
00161e  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001620  2800              CMP      r0,#0
001622  d006              BEQ      |L1.5682|
001624  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
001626  d004              BEQ      |L1.5682|
;;;943    	{
;;;944    	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
001628  eb020106          ADD      r1,r2,r6
00162c  f04f005f          MOV      r0,#0x5f
001630  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.5682|
;;;945    	}
;;;946    
;;;947    }
001632  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;948    
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;949    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;950    void ip2lcd(	short in1,
001634  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;951    			short in2,
;;;952    			short in3,
;;;953    			short in4,
;;;954    			char xy,
;;;955    			char flash_pos)
;;;956    {
001638  4607              MOV      r7,r0
00163a  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
00163e  4688              MOV      r8,r1
001640  4691              MOV      r9,r2
001642  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;957    char i;
;;;958    //char n;
;;;959    
;;;960    //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;961    //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;962    i=find(xy);
001644  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;963    
;;;964    //in1=192;
;;;965    
;;;966    //in2=34;
;;;967    
;;;968    if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
001648  4bee              LDR      r3,|L1.6660|
;;;969    	{
;;;970    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
00164a  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
00164c  4cec              LDR      r4,|L1.6656|
;;;971    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;972    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;973    	}
;;;974    else 
;;;975    	{
;;;976    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
00164e  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;977    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;978    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
001650  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
001654  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;968
001656  d109              BNE      |L1.5740|
001658  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;968  ; bFL2
00165a  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.5740|
00165c  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;970
001660  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;970
001664  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;970
001666  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;971
001668  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;972
00166a  e017              B        |L1.5788|
                  |L1.5740|
00166c  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;976
001670  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;976
001674  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0              ;976
001678  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;976
00167c  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;976
001680  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;977
001684  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;977
001688  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;977
00168c  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;977
001690  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001694  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001698  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.5788|
;;;979    	}
;;;980    
;;;981    if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
00169c  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
00169e  d109              BNE      |L1.5812|
0016a0  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
0016a2  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.5812|
;;;982    	{
;;;983    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
0016a4  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
0016a8  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
0016ac  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;984    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
0016ae  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;985    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
0016b0  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
0016b2  e017              B        |L1.5860|
                  |L1.5812|
;;;986    	}
;;;987    else 
;;;988    	{
;;;989    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
0016b4  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
0016b8  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
0016bc  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
0016c0  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
0016c4  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
0016c8  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;990    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
0016cc  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
0016d0  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
0016d4  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0016d8  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;991    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
0016da  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
0016de  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
0016e2  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.5860|
;;;992    	}
;;;993    
;;;994    if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
0016e4  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
0016e6  d109              BNE      |L1.5884|
0016e8  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
0016ea  b13e              CBZ      r6,|L1.5884|
;;;995    	{
;;;996    	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
0016ec  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
0016f0  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
0016f4  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;997    	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
0016f6  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;998    	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
0016f8  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
0016fa  e017              B        |L1.5932|
                  |L1.5884|
;;;999    	}
;;;1000   else 
;;;1001   	{
;;;1002   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
0016fc  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001700  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001704  eb040600          ADD      r6,r4,r0
001708  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
00170c  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
001710  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1003   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001714  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
001718  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
00171c  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001720  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1004   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001722  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001726  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
00172a  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.5932|
;;;1005   	}
;;;1006   
;;;1007   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
00172c  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
00172e  d109              BNE      |L1.5956|
001730  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001732  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.5956|
;;;1008   	{
;;;1009   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
001734  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1010   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
001736  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
001738  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
00173c  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1011   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
00173e  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.5952|
;;;1012   	}
;;;1013   else 
;;;1014   	{
;;;1015   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1016   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1017   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1018   	}
;;;1019   }
001740  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.5956|
001744  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1015
001748  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1015
00174c  f1030330          ADD      r3,r3,#0x30           ;1015
001750  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1015
001752  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1016
001756  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1016
00175a  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1016
00175c  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1016
001760  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1016
001764  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1016
001766  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1017
00176a  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1017
00176e  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1017
001770  e7e6              B        |L1.5952|
;;;1020   
                          ENDP

                  checkboxing PROC
;;;1021   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1022   void checkboxing(char xy,short in)
001772  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1023   {
001774  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;1024   char i;
;;;1025   i=find(xy);
001776  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1026   if(in)lcd_buffer[i]=3;
00177a  49a1              LDR      r1,|L1.6656|
00177c  b11c              CBZ      r4,|L1.6022|
00177e  f04f0203          MOV      r2,#3
001782  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
;;;1027   else lcd_buffer[i]=4;	 
;;;1028   }
001784  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
                  |L1.6022|
001786  f04f0204          MOV      r2,#4                 ;1027
00178a  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]            ;1027
00178c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;1029   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1060   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1061   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
00178e  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1062   {
;;;1063   char i;
;;;1064   char n;
;;;1065   
;;;1066   i=(20*y)+x;
001790  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
001794  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
001798  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1067   
;;;1068   n=*((char*)&in);
00179a  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1069   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
00179e  489a              LDR      r0,|L1.6664|
0017a0  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
0017a4  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
0017a6  4996              LDR      r1,|L1.6656|
0017a8  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1070   i--;
0017aa  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0017ae  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1071   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0017b0  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0017b4  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0017b6  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1072   i--;
0017b8  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0017bc  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1073   
;;;1074   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
0017be  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1075   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0017c2  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
0017c6  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
0017c8  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1076   i--;
0017ca  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0017ce  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1077   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0017d0  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0017d4  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0017d6  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1078   i--;
0017d8  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0017dc  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1079   
;;;1080   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
0017de  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1081   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0017e2  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
0017e6  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
0017e8  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1082   i--;
0017ea  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0017ee  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1083   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
0017f0  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
0017f4  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
0017f6  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1084   i--;
0017f8  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
0017fc  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1085   
;;;1086   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
0017fe  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1087   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001802  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
001806  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001808  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1088   i--;
00180a  f1a30301          SUB      r3,r3,#1
00180e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1089   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001810  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
001814  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
001816  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1090   i--;
;;;1091   }
001818  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1092   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1164   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1165   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
00181a  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1166   {
;;;1167   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
00181c  497b              LDR      r1,|L1.6668|
00181e  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
001820  4b77              LDR      r3,|L1.6656|
001822  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
001826  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
00182a  428a              CMP      r2,r1
00182c  d104              BNE      |L1.6200|
00182e  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001832  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1168   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1169   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1170   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1171   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1172   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1173   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1174   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1175   }
001836  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.6200|
001838  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1168
00183a  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1168
00183c  d106              BNE      |L1.6220|
00183e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1168
001842  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1168
001846  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1168
00184a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.6220|
00184c  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1169
00184e  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1169
001850  d106              BNE      |L1.6240|
001852  f1000002          ADD      r0,r0,#2              ;1169
001856  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1169
00185a  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1169
00185e  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.6240|
001860  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1170
001862  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1170
001864  d106              BNE      |L1.6260|
001866  f1000003          ADD      r0,r0,#3              ;1170
00186a  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1170
00186e  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1170
001872  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.6260|
001874  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1171
001876  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1171
001878  d106              BNE      |L1.6280|
00187a  f1000004          ADD      r0,r0,#4              ;1171
00187e  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1171
001882  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1171
001886  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.6280|
001888  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1172
00188a  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1172
00188c  d106              BNE      |L1.6300|
00188e  f1000005          ADD      r0,r0,#5              ;1172
001892  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1172
001896  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1172
00189a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.6300|
00189c  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1173
00189e  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1173
0018a0  d106              BNE      |L1.6320|
0018a2  f1000006          ADD      r0,r0,#6              ;1173
0018a6  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1173
0018aa  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1173
                  |L1.6318|
0018ae  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.6320|
0018b0  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1174
0018b2  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1174
0018b4  d1fb              BNE      |L1.6318|
0018b6  f1000007          ADD      r0,r0,#7              ;1174
0018ba  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1174
0018be  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1174
0018c2  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1176   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1178   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1179   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
0018c4  4b52              LDR      r3,|L1.6672|
;;;1180   {
;;;1181   ind_pointer--;
0018c6  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
0018c8  f1a20201          SUB      r2,r2,#1
;;;1182   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
0018cc  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
0018ce  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
0018d0  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1183   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
0018d2  4a50              LDR      r2,|L1.6676|
0018d4  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
0018d8  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
0018da  484c              LDR      r0,|L1.6668|
0018dc  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
0018de  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
0018e0  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
0018e2  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1184   
;;;1185   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
0018e4  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
0018e6  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
0018e8  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1186   }
0018ea  4770              BX       lr
;;;1187   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1188   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1189   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
0018ec  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1190   {
;;;1191   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
0018ee  4d48              LDR      r5,|L1.6672|
0018f0  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
0018f4  f1040601          ADD      r6,r4,#1
0018f8  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
0018fa  4d46              LDR      r5,|L1.6676|
0018fc  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
001900  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
001902  4c42              LDR      r4,|L1.6668|
001904  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
001906  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
001908  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
00190a  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1192   ind=(i_enum)tind;
00190c  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1193   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
00190e  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1194   index_set=tindex_set;
001910  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1195   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
001912  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1196   }
001914  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1197   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1198   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1199   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
001916  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1200   {
00191a  4680              MOV      r8,r0
00191c  460f              MOV      r7,r1
00191e  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1201   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1202   clr_scrn();
001920  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1203   
;;;1204   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
001924  4c36              LDR      r4,|L1.6656|
;;;1205   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001926  f04f0500          MOV      r5,#0
                  |L1.6442|
;;;1206   	{
;;;1207   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
00192a  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
00192e  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
001932  f1050501          ADD      r5,r5,#1              ;1205
001936  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1205
001938  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1205
00193a  d3f6              BCC      |L1.6442|
;;;1208   	}
;;;1209   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00193c  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.6464|
;;;1210   	{
;;;1211   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
001940  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
001944  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001948  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1209
00194c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1209
00194e  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1209
001950  d3f6              BCC      |L1.6464|
;;;1212   	}
;;;1213   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001952  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.6486|
;;;1214   	{
;;;1215   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
001956  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
00195a  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
00195e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1213
001962  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1213
001964  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1213
001966  d3f6              BCC      |L1.6486|
;;;1216   	}
;;;1217   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001968  f04f0000          MOV      r0,#0
                  |L1.6508|
;;;1218   	{
;;;1219   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
00196c  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
001970  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001974  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1              ;1217
001978  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1217
00197a  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1217
00197c  d3f6              BCC      |L1.6508|
;;;1220   	}
;;;1221   
;;;1222   
;;;1223   }
00197e  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1224   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1240   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1241   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
001982  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1242   {
001984  9c03              LDR      r4,[sp,#0xc]
;;;1243   //bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
;;;1244   //tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
;;;1245   //ret((char)(m_sec/100));
;;;1246   show_mess_cnt=(char)(m_sec/100);
001986  f04f0564          MOV      r5,#0x64
00198a  fb94f4f5          SDIV     r4,r4,r5
00198e  4d22              LDR      r5,|L1.6680|
001990  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;1247   show_mess_p1=p1;
001992  4c22              LDR      r4,|L1.6684|
001994  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
;;;1248   show_mess_p2=p2;
001996  4822              LDR      r0,|L1.6688|
001998  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
;;;1249   show_mess_p3=p3;
00199a  4822              LDR      r0,|L1.6692|
00199c  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
;;;1250   show_mess_p4=p4;
00199e  4822              LDR      r0,|L1.6696|
0019a0  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
;;;1251   }
0019a2  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1252   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1279   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1280   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
0019a4  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1281   {
0019a8  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1282   char iii;
;;;1283   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1284   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1285   		
;;;1286   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1287   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1288   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1289   tempii*=32;
0019aa  ea4f1040          LSL      r0,r0,#5
;;;1290   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
0019ae  f5006080          ADD      r0,r0,#0x400
0019b2  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;1291        
;;;1292   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
0019b4  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
0019b6  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0019b8  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1293   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
0019bc  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
0019be  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
0019c2  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1294   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
0019c6  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0019c8  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
0019cc  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1295   
;;;1296   iii=find(simbol);
0019d0  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0019d2  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1297   
;;;1298   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0019d6  4c0a              LDR      r4,|L1.6656|
0019d8  f04f0620          MOV      r6,#0x20
0019dc  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0019e0  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0019e2  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1299   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0019e4  f04f0730          MOV      r7,#0x30
0019e8  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
0019ec  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0019ee  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1300   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0019f0  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
0019f4  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
0019f8  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0019fa  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1301   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
0019fe  e015              B        |L1.6700|
                  |L1.6656|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.6660|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.6664|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.6668|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.6672|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.6676|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.6680|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L1.6684|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L1.6688|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L1.6692|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L1.6696|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L1.6700|
001a2c  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
001a30  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001a34  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001a36  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1302   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001a3a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001a3e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001a40  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1303   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001a42  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001a46  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001a48  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1304   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001a4a  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001a4e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001a50  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1305   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
001a52  f04f0223          MOV      r2,#0x23
001a56  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001a5a  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
001a5c  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1306   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
001a5e  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
001a62  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
001a66  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
001a6a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1307   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
001a6e  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
001a72  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001a74  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
001a76  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1308   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
001a7a  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001a7e  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
001a80  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
001a82  d303              BCC      |L1.6796|
001a84  f04f0001          MOV      r0,#1
001a88  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.6796|
;;;1309   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
001a8c  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001a90  4919              LDR      r1,|L1.6904|
001a92  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001a94  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
001a98  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
001a9a  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1310   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
001a9e  f1050001          ADD      r0,r5,#1
001aa2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001aa4  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1311   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001aa6  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001aaa  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001aac  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1312   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
001aae  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001ab2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001ab4  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1313   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
001ab8  f04f023a          MOV      r2,#0x3a
001abc  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001ac0  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001ac2  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1314   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001ac4  f1010001          ADD      r0,r1,#1
001ac8  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001aca  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1315   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
001acc  f1000101          ADD      r1,r0,#1
001ad0  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
001ad2  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1316   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
001ad6  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
001ada  f04f0200          MOV      r2,#0
001ade  f04f0121          MOV      r1,#0x21
001ae2  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1317   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
001ae6  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
001aea  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001aec  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
001aee  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1318      		     		
;;;1319   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001af2  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1320   }	
001af4  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
                          ENDP

                  |L1.6904|
                          DCD      sm_mont

                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da04              BGE      |L2.20|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  ea6f0000          MVN      r0,r0
00000e  f1000001          ADD      r0,r0,#1
000012  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.20|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000028  d022              BEQ      |L2.112|
00002a  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002e  4d12              LDR      r5,|L2.120|
000030  4a12              LDR      r2,|L2.124|
                  |L2.50|
000032  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000034  d202              BCS      |L2.60|
000036  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000038  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003a  e011              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.60|
00003c  d108              BNE      |L2.80|
00003e  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000042  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000044  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000048  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
00004e  e007              B        |L2.96|
                  |L2.80|
000050  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000052  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000054  d004              BEQ      |L2.96|
000056  b164              CBZ      r4,|L2.114|
000058  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
00005c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.96|
000060  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000064  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000066  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00006a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00006c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00006e  d3e0              BCC      |L2.50|
                  |L2.112|
000070  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.114|
000072  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000074  e7f4              B        |L2.96|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000076  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.120|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.3||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000008  da02              BGE      |L3.16|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  f1c00000          RSB      r0,r0,#0
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.16|
000010  f04f062d          MOV      r6,#0x2d
000014  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000018  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
000020  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000022  f7fffffe          BL       find
000026  f04f0100          MOV      r1,#0
00002a  4a1a              LDR      r2,|L3.148|
00002c  4c1a              LDR      r4,|L3.152|
                  |L3.46|
00002e  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.80|
000030  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000032  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000034  d00c              BEQ      |L3.80|
000036  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000038  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
00003a  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
00003c  d106              BNE      |L3.76|
00003e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
000040  d104              BNE      |L3.76|
000042  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000046  4637              MOV      r7,r6
000048  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.76|
00004c  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00004e  e017              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.80|
000050  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
000052  d202              BCS      |L3.90|
000054  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000056  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000058  e012              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.90|
00005a  d108              BNE      |L3.110|
00005c  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000060  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000062  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000066  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000068  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00006c  e008              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.110|
00006e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000070  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000072  d004              BEQ      |L3.126|
000074  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000078  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
00007c  e000              B        |L3.128|
                  |L3.126|
00007e  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
                  |L3.128|
000080  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000084  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000086  f1010101          ADD      r1,r1,#1
00008a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00008c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00008e  d3ce              BCC      |L3.46|
000090  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000092  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.148|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.4||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a07              LDR      r2,|L4.40|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4906              LDR      r1,|L4.44|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
00001a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001c  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
000020  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000022  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4a06              LDR      r2,|L5.40|
00000e  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
000012  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
000014  4b05              LDR      r3,|L5.44|
000016  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
000022  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
000024  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
000026  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L5.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L5.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0f              LDR      r3,|L6.76|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0f              LDR      r4,|L6.80|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00001c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001e  ea4f1210          LSR      r2,r0,#4
000022  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000026  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000028  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
00002a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00002e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000030  ea4f1112          LSR      r1,r2,#4
000034  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000038  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
00003a  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
00003c  f1a00001          SUB      r0,r0,#1
000040  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000042  ea4f1111          LSR      r1,r1,#4
000046  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
000048  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00004a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.76|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.80|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  4921              LDR      r1,|L7.148|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  f1a40201          SUB      r2,r4,#1
000018  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
00001a  4a1f              LDR      r2,|L7.152|
00001c  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001e  ea4f0450          LSR      r4,r0,#1
000022  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000026  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000028  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
00002c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00002e  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000030  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000034  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000038  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00003a  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
00003e  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000040  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000042  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000046  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00004a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00004c  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000050  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000052  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000054  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
000058  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00005c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00005e  f1a00301          SUB      r3,r0,#1
000062  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000064  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000066  ea4f0454          LSR      r4,r4,#1
00006a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00006e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000070  f1a30001          SUB      r0,r3,#1
000074  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000076  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000078  ea4f0354          LSR      r3,r4,#1
00007c  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000080  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
000082  f1a00401          SUB      r4,r0,#1
000086  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
000088  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
00008a  ea4f0053          LSR      r0,r3,#1
00008e  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000090  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000092  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L7.148|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L7.152|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.8||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.8||, ||.text||
                  show_mess_number PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  e9dd4606          LDRD     r4,r6,[sp,#0x18]
000006  9d05              LDR      r5,[sp,#0x14]
000008  f04f0764          MOV      r7,#0x64
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000c  fb95f5f7          SDIV     r5,r5,r7
000010  4f07              LDR      r7,|L8.48|
000012  703d              STRB     r5,[r7,#0]
000014  4d07              LDR      r5,|L8.52|
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; show_mess_p1
000018  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.56|
00001a  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p2
00001c  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.60|
00001e  6002              STR      r2,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p3
000020  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.64|
000022  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; show_mess_p4
000024  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.68|
000026  8004              STRH     r4,[r0,#0]
000028  4807              LDR      r0,|L8.72|
00002a  7006              STRB     r6,[r0,#0]
00002c  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00002e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L8.48|
                          DCD      show_mess_cnt
                  |L8.52|
                          DCD      show_mess_p1
                  |L8.56|
                          DCD      show_mess_p2
                  |L8.60|
                          DCD      show_mess_p3
                  |L8.64|
                          DCD      show_mess_p4
                  |L8.68|
                          DCD      show_mess_number_
                  |L8.72|
                          DCD      show_mess_komma
